mapper.sql: id, orderId, hsId, settleDate, discountType, discountInterest, discountDays, discountAmount, tsc, tsu
mapper.select: SELECT seller.id, seller.orderId, seller.hsId, seller.settleDate, seller.discountType, seller.discountInterest, seller.discountDays, seller.discountAmount, seller.tsc, seller.tsu, sum(buyer.amount), sum(buyer.money) FROM hs_same_settle_seller seller LEFT JOIN hs_same_settle_buyer buyer ON seller.hsId = buyer.hsId AND seller.orderId = buyer.orderId WHERE seller.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND seller.deleted = 0 GROUP BY seller.orderId

SELECT seller.id, seller.orderId, seller.hsId, seller.settleDate, seller.discountType, seller.discountInterest, seller.discountDays, seller.discountAmount, seller.tsc, seller.tsu, sum(buyer.amount), sum(buyer.money) FROM hs_same_settle_seller seller LEFT JOIN hs.same_settle_buyer buyer ON seller.hsId = buyer.hsId AND seller.orderId = buyer.orderId WHERE seller.orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND seller.deleted = 0 GROUP BY seller.orderId

select seller.id, seller.orderId, seller.hsId, seller.settleDate, seller.discountType, seller.discountInterest, seller.discountDays, seller.discountAmount, seller.tsc, seller.tsu, sum(buyer.amount), sum(buyer.money) FROM hs_same_settle_seller seller LEFT JOIN hs_same_settle_buyer buyer ON seller.hsId = buyer.hsId AND seller.orderId = buyer.orderId
AND seller.orderId=#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND seller.hsId= #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND seller.settleDate=#{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND seller.deleted = 0
group by seller.orderId
mapper.insert: INSERT hs_same_settle_seller ( id, orderId, hsId, settleDate, discountType, discountInterest, discountDays, discountAmount, tsc) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert hs_same_settle_seller
id, orderId, hsId, settleDate, discountType, discountInterest, discountDays, discountAmount, tsc,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update: UPDATE hs_same_settle_seller SET orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, settleDate = #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, discountType = #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discountInterest = #{discountInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discountDays = #{discountDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discountAmount = #{discountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
